Quasimodo (site na Quasimodo Sunday) bụ onye akụkọ ifo na onye isi na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Hunchback of Notre-Dame (1831) nke Victor Hugo. A mụrụ Quasimodo na-enwe azụ azụ ma ndị obodo na-atụ egwu ya dị ka ụdị anụ ọhịa, mana ọ chọtara ebe nsọ na ihụnanya na-agaghị ekwe omume nke na-emezu naanị na ọnwụ

Ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-arụ ọrụ Quasimodo na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri, gụnyere Lon Chaney (1923), Charles Laughton (1939) na Anthony Quinn (1956), yana Tom Hulce na 1996 Disney animated adaptation, na nso nso a Angelo Del Vecchio na Notre Dame de Paris revival

Na afọ 2010, onye nchọpụta Britain chọtara ihe akaebe na-egosi na e nwere onye na-ese nkume nke na-arụ ọrụ na Notre Dame na otu oge ahụ Victor Hugo na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ma ha nwere ike ọbụna mara ibe ha.
A na-akọwa Quasimodo nwere nkwarụ dị ka "ihe jọgburu onwe ya" na "ihe okike nke ekwensu"
A mụrụ ya na nnukwu oghere azụ, na nnukwu ogwu nke kpuchiri anya aka ekpe ya
A mụrụ ya na gbụrụ Gypsy, mana n'ihi ọdịdị ya dị egwu, a gbanwere ya n'oge ọ bụ nwa ọhụrụ na nwa agbọghọ nwere ike, Agnes

Mgbe a chọtara ya, nne Agnes chụpụrụ Quasimodo (onye kwenyere na ndị Gypsies riri nwa ya) wee kpọga ya Paris, ebe a chọtara ọ gbahapụrụ ya na Notre Dame (na àkwà ụmụntakịrị, ebe a hapụrụ ụmụ mgbei na ụmụaka a na-achọghị maka ọrụ ebere ọha na eze) na Quasimodo Sunday, Sunday mbụ mgbe Ista gasịrị, site na aka Claude Frollo, Archdeacon nke Notre Dame, onye nabatara nwa ahụ, aha ya mgbe ụbọchị a chọtara nwa ahụ gasịrị, ma kpọlite ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-akpọ mgbịrị mgbịrịgba nke katidral ahụ
Na ihi ụda mgbịrịgba, Quasimodo ghọkwara onye ntị chiri na-eme ka Frollo kụziere ya asụsụ ndị ogbi
Ọ bụ ezie na a kpọrọ ya asị maka nkwarụ ya, a kpughere na ọ nwere obiọma na obi
Ọ bụ ezie na Quasimodo na-eme ihe ike na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, a na-eme nke a naanị mgbe ndị ọzọ nyere ya ntụziaka.
N'ịbụ onye ndị Paris na ozuzu ha lere anya dị ka anụ ọhịa, ọ kwenyere na Frollo bụ naanị onye na-elekọta ya, ọ na-esokwa ya mgbe Archdeacon na-apụ na Notre Dame
Frollo nwere mmasị n'ebe nwa agbọghọ Gypsy mara mma aha ya bụ Esmeralda nọ, ma tinye Quasimodo na i gbalị ịtọrọ ya
(E mechara kpughee na ọ bụ Agnes, a gbanwere nwa Quasimodo.) Captain Phoebus de Châteaupers rutere iji kwụsị ntọrọ ahụ ma jide Quasimodo, na amaghị na Quasimodo na-agbaso iwu Frollo
Onye ọka ikpe ntị chiri Florian Barbedienne mara ya ikpe otu awa nke ịpịa ya ụtarị na otu awa ọzọ nke mmechuihu na pillory
Phoebus kechiri Quasimodo ma mee ka Pierre Torterue tie ya ụtarị n'ihu ìgwè mmadụ na-akwa emo
Mgbe Quasimodo kpọrọ ya maka enyemaka, Frollo kwere ka a taa Quasimodo ahụhụ dị ka ntaramahụhụ maka ọdịda ya
Mgbe Quasimodo kpọrọ maka mmiri, otu nwatakịrị tụbara ya ákwà mmiri
Na ihụ akpịrị ịkpọ nkụ ya, Esmeralda gakwuuru ụlọ ahịa ọha na eze ma nye ya ihe ọṅụṅụ mmiri
Ọ zọpụtara ya ma ọ na-ejide obi ya.
